name: Pomeroy et al. v. Bushong, Exr., Appellant

Pee Curiam,
Tbe judgment is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge SCHAEFFER.

casebody.head_matter:
Pomeroy et al. v. Bushong, Exr., Appellant.
Argued January 28, 1935.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaeeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
E. E. Deysher, for appellant.
Charles W. Matten, with him Ralph B. Evans, for ap-pellees.
February 6, 1935:
